metadata.name: Wab/Wabmig Unusual Parent Or Child Processes
metadata.comment: Detects unusual parent or children of the wab.exe (Windows Contacts) and Wabmig.exe (Microsoft Address Book Import Tool) processes as seen being used with bumblebee activity

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND ((endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wmiprvse.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\svchost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\dllhost.exe'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wab.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wabmig.exe'))) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wab.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wabmig.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects unusual parent or children of the wab.exe (Windows Contacts) and Wabmig.exe (Microsoft Address Book Import Tool) processes as seen being used with bumblebee activity
